website_summaries.verdict: When there's a new driver to keep track of, this easy-to-use unit provides incredible peace of mind.
pros: Doesn't require a battery, as it plugs into the vehicle's Onboard Diagnostic (OBD) port
Not only shows driving routes, but tracks speed, heavy braking, and acceleration
provides alerts via text and email if driver goes outside of designated area
cons: Unit currently only works in North America, and can't be used in vehicles manufactured before 1996

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this is you want to use it without your kid knowing
customer_reviews.text: They call your house and try to sell you something, left a message on the machine, right during dinner, man that set me up for some awkward conversation. Thanks!! now they know....... not the point of what I was doing, other than that it works great and the software is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all!
customer_reviews.text: My old car will not start when I installed it, which is the car I intend to pass on to my new driver in our family. Then I installed it in my other car. It worked fine for 2 days and it slowly killed my alternator. I was so mad because I've just put a new battery in it. So I had to replace the alternator which cost about $400. Therefore, I will not recommend this GPS tracker for anyone. It's waste of my money and precious time.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN OSUNDINA

customer_reviews.title: good to know where he is at
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 80 yr old father, good to know where he is at, especially since he seldom carries his cell phone. Just be sure you check where the OBDII port is located on your car to make sure there is room for this device. On a 2007 Hyundai Santa Fe, it stuck down nearly 2” in front of the brake pedal where it could be easily kicked entering or exiting the car, so I had to buy a 90 degree OBDII cord that allowed me to install it more remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product to Monitor Your Teens Driving Habits
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use, incredibly accurate. Great piece of mind wihen you set a young teen driver loose on the road. Need to review and adjust posted speed limits (esp in rural areas), set curfews, multiple geofences and push notifications preferences (many options)...once this is done, the app is amazingly accurate. It has given us the piece of mind setting our teen out on the road; $19/month subscription fee is money well spent! If car is temporarily out of commission and teen is driving another....just remove and plug into new vehicle...back up and running. Great product....all 'pros' .....no 'cons' what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: TC Girl

customer_reviews.title: It works when it wants to but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product has not worked properly since we purchased it. It seemed like a good product, and the reviews seemed good... Maybe its just my android phone? But...this tracker is garbage! It works here and there but never consistent. I thought my son had unplugged the device so I would go and check his vehicle and make sure it was plugged in correctly and then make him drive while i was watching and still...nothing. It said he had stopped. I would have returned it but I was going through surgery and missed the deadline to return it but... definitely not worth the money at all! Not for me anyway. Sorry :(
customer_reviews.author: Londen Tabor

customer_reviews.title: keep track of the elderly, young drivers or wayward spouses!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Easy to set up and install. * Update * After using this product and achieving the results I needed, I requested to "suspend" my account so I wouldn't be billed monthly until I need to use the tracking service again. Just 2 days later my account was charged the monthly fee after I was told otherwise. I've had two more conversations with the operator (Wanda) and I was promised that the charge would be removed. After two weeks I'm getting no help from customer service. The product itself is great, but absolutely the worst customer service.
customer_reviews.author: dave clark

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 30 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: It started off great by tracking speed, quick braking, stops, and driving route. It worked for maybe 30 minutes and then it showed the car stopped when it wasn't. Then it would just pick up random places. I have tried calling tech and had to leave a message but no response so far. This is a waste of my money if no one can help...very upsetting!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Messed up my truck!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my 2017 Nissan Frontier this morning. It never did sync or show a location. I created a support ticket as suggested by the website and never heard anything back. This afternoon I drove to a friend's house and when I got ready to leave my truck would not start. I unplugged the device and my truck started but my engine light has been on since . I will not be plugging this back in my vehicle and I will definitely be returning it! Very disappointed after reading so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Daniels

customer_reviews.title: HOW LONG SHOULD IT TAKE TO UPDATE A LOCATION
customer_reviews.text: UPDATES FOR A CURRENT LOCATION CAN TAKE UP TO AN HOUR. THERE ARE SOFTWARE UPDATES THAT MAY BE AVAILABLE BUT WE HAVE YET TO FIND OUT IF THAT HELPS. THESE SOFTWARE UPDATES ARE NOT AUTOMATIC , YOU MUST FIRST COMPLAIN ABOUT THE ABOVE BEFORE THEY WILL TRY THE FIRMWARE UPDATE. STAY TUNED FOR FURTHER INFORMATION. DON'T BELIEVE THE 5 STAR RATING.
customer_reviews.author: Northport

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Has done everything it said. SUPER easy set up!!! We bought this to track to hold accountability with an adult child who needed to gain trust back. Holding them accountable! Love it!! It has helped avoid battles and lying about whereabouts!!! Did I say I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not track right!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and installed it, and it wouldn't give proper traveling information. It would make a straight line from one destination to another, does not send speed warnings, or alerts, nothing worked. I even called customer service and they couldn't figure it out. They charged me an extra month, even when I canceled the subscription. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. After you drive around simply close the app on your phone and reopen it and you will see your location and driving stats. Has a feature that lets you know if the unit was tampered with. (if removed from OBD port) Unit tells you exact route. Speeds, hard stopping, hard Accelerator action, and gives you a grade.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Berner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect device to track my teen!
customer_reviews.text: Love your gps product! It gives the most complete information of all tracking devices we have tried, and it is accurate and reliable as well! I recommend your product all of the time when friends ask how we keep track of our three teens who drive. thank you motosafety
customer_reviews.author: Sam_I_Am

customer_reviews.title: Good Product... Monthly fee
customer_reviews.text: I used this item to track my car when I shipped it across country. Worked like a charm. I was able to confirm that the shipper did not use my vehicle as "local transport" as so many horror stories say. I also installed one in my aging mother's car to see where she was going after several trips where she got lost. I never tried the geofencing option but I intend to look into that soon.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 service trucks that I have purchased these for and they have already paid for themselves. Guys are putting in their time and not taking out for lunch breaks or extra personal stops. Now i know when and where and how long. Only problem I have had is with the map itself that they use. Most of the time it is pretty accurate, but on one section of our town the map will show SW instead of NW where the pin is actually at. Not a problem for me though .
customer_reviews.author: tamb1234

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping track of teens
customer_reviews.text: Device works great to keep track of my teenage daughter. Gives up to date location details each minute and let's me know if she is speeding or breaking hard, how much gas is in the car and her battery info. I wish I would have gotten this months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: excellent product!!! super accurate, real time updates and exact location at all times, mobile app works great too. plug it in and its working. highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Product OK, customer nservice horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as it should for me since I bought it on Amazon 2 years ago....after paying $20 a month for two years, I sold the vehicle and called to cancel service....easy right? No, Mooney answers when I call, I get voicemail....I left 2 voicemails to cancel...I got a message saying they need to talk to me about cancelling service, I call back, I leave another message....meanwhile I get billed again....except now the rate has gone up to $22. I'll have to cancel the credit card I use for payment I suppose..... Not a bad product. Horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: ddub

customer_reviews.title: Great price, but $20 per month subscription
customer_reviews.text: Ease of installation: as easy as plugging it into the OBDll port and download the app or logging into the website after creating an account. So far works perfectly, though the interface is a little tricky for looking back more than a couple days. Beware: this, and probably all GPS trackers, requires a monthly subscription. I don't need it full time, which makes that an expensive proposition going forward. That said, tracking and alerts are perfect for your teen driver. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Buck

customer_reviews.title: great for the teenager in your life
customer_reviews.text: So a week after my 16 year old got his licence, a parent told us said 16 year old was doing 80 while on the way to a school function. Needless to say, three days later, this little dohickey was purchased and installed. It's great. It gives us a map of his route, his speeds, whether he braked hard or not, even how long the car idles. I do feel that the speed limits are not always correct but I can overlook that. I know things like that change quite frequently. Anyway, it's a great little dohickey that I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KiminAL

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product that is worth every penny for safety and peace of mind for teen driver and parents!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit for our 17 year old, driving our car to school. It is great! Tells up in real time, exactly where the car is and how it is being driven. Helps insure a young person keeps their mind on driving the car, safely. Excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gaertner

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: My husband has dementia and I can keep track of him when he is in the car. It is very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: June Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping an eye on my daughter's driving
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping an eye on my daughter's driving. The app is convenient. I've called customer service a few times to learn how to do some things and ask questions, and they are very helpful and professional. My only thought it: you can see the little lights on the front blinking, and while that's useful for knowing it's working, I think it would be good if you could cover them or turn them off. I covered them with electrical tape.
customer_reviews.author: starfinder

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer Service and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I plugged in and worked immediately. I was able to start reviewing my son's driving behaviors right away. The company's customer service is amazing as well. I just talked to Alex with customer service who was very patient and kind. I tried to cancel in January when I no longer needed this for my son who older now but I didn't give them all the necessary information. I just realized it was never cancelled and I've still been charged every month. Alex was able to have a refund approved for me. I would definitely use this product again when my next child starts driving! I also recommend this to all of my friends who have kids.
customer_reviews.author: Terrah Carawan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have put one on each of my daughters' cars and they work perfectly. They help remind us all to pay attention to speed limits and road conditions. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: MONEY MONEY MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and I was not satisfied as I paid quite a price and the device was visible in the car as I didn't want the child to see the device. Then, in addition, I was informed I had to pay a month subscription plus more. I later looked into a free phone app that fulfilled the needed purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley 👑 😇🙏🏽

customer_reviews.title: It’s always on when vehicle is off!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my elderly mother and it keeps running her car battery down. Replaced the car battery and had the alternator checked. The problem is that this thing is always on even with the car turned off. Since her car sits for several days if not a week or so at a time it allows the battery to drain down. Fine if you need to know where the vehicle is when off. I just need to know last known location. Hope this helps’
customer_reviews.author: D1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Teen drivers - Driving Instructor / Medic Review
customer_reviews.text: I am a drivers education center owner, paramedic and parent. If you have a teen driver you need this. It is the perfect device for protecting your child, and keeping track of their location. This device is perfect to coach new drivers and also potentially lessen the number of surprise pregnancy cases with teens by letting you know where they are and have been. 1000% endorsed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Stops working and you wont get your money back
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen driver at home. At first it worked good, then after 2 months, it started beeping randomly and then stopped working completely. Would get one notification every 2 weeks and hard to get a tech to fix or even respond. Ended up cancelling after paying 5 plus months and could not even get a supervisor to call back until a couple weeks later, and then only refunded one month of expensive service. The lack of connectivity was product based and should have had a better resolution. Disappointed because had high hopes in it.
customer_reviews.author: KB Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Monthly fees 👎🏾
customer_reviews.text: Works great on point with position but the monthly fees I hate. But I guess you’re brave you pay to play and I’m damn sure paying!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad billing practices
customer_reviews.text: Product works good but they are incapable of charging my credit card each month. They say it’s declined and suspend my account. I call my bank and they say MOTOSafety never charged the card. I call the company back and by some miracle they are able to charge my card. They keep telling me I have to give them a different card which I’m not going to do because they did the same thing when they had a different card. This has been going on for at least the last 8-10 months. It’s super frustrating. But I’m not comfirtsble with giving them different cards each time when they clearly are not actually running them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B

customer_reviews.title: If it looses power like mine did when a fuse blew for the port ...
customer_reviews.text: This item works well, but not sure how to reset car type. It stays with the first car you plug it into as the car ID and never changes even if you move it to another car. It tracks well and sends a daily report on the vehicle. If it looses power like mine did when a fuse blew for the port it plugs into, there is no tamper alert sent, it just stays with last reported location. Tracking is in a straight line from point to point. I am satisfied with it thus far. I go the male to female 1 foot plug with mine so my son could not see it, and tie tied it under the dash.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo O. Berry III

customer_reviews.title: worth the subscription $ for a new driver
customer_reviews.text: love this gadget & the app. have used for 6 mo. neighbor-parents recommended this & before my son started driving I thought this + monthly subscription was extravagent. then the first time his phone had location off, I thought this was a super value and purchased/installed immediately. the app is easy to use & no glitches. it's simple enough so we can have quick conversations about the occasional alerts I see (e.g. rapid acceleration or braking) or where he has been driving. side-benefit: I find the app easier/faster to track his current location than the ubiquitous 360 app.
customer_reviews.author: measuretwice

customer_reviews.title: Could not say enough good. Very easy to install and bring up on ...
customer_reviews.text: If you need or want to see how your teenager is driving or just need to know for sure where they are this is what you want!! Could not say enough good. Very easy to install and bring up on your computer or phone to see anything you need. I had the problem that car was wrecked and did not need service for a few months, they were great about suspending service until needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is quite amazing! Plugged it in and it was ready in less than 15 minuets. I’m super impressed with this little device. Believe me- if I can do it... anyone can do it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, esy to setup. Breeze to install. Mapping is very user friendly and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product...it gives a parent peace of mind knowing where your child or atleast their vehicle is located.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I know they sell this as a device to use for teenage drivers but I got it for my best friend’s dad’s car. It gives us peace of mind knowing where he is. It is very easy to install and very easy to set up. I highly recommend it for use in elderly family members cars.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works great, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as advertised. The first unit I ordered failed within a day. A replacement was immediately sent when I reported it. I had to call customer service to have the old device ID removed from my account and the call was immediately answered by a US rep. But reporting the device problem using the web page went unanswered.
customer_reviews.author: BST

customer_reviews.title: BE IN CONTROL!  PROTECT YOUR KIDS, YOUR CAR, AND YOUR INSURANCE PREMIUMS
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for parents with young and of course unpredictable teenage drivers. Simple to setup, simple to install, and has worked flawlessly. We know where they going, when they left, and how concerned they are about keeping their driving privileges. When you go out of town or have late night yourself, you know that they followed the curfew time you set. No more, "hi mom I'm home" when they are elsewhere. Peace of mind for you and the report card does help change their driving habits. The monthly expense is worth the benefits and like others said- "peace of mind" and CONTROL.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Never got it to work - returning
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it never worked, but went through all the instructions, followed everything, lights were working as it said it should. On the app, I continually received "No Position Available" over two days. Tried reaching Tech Support, no one there. Returning. Plus, I had to pay the monthly $19.33+ tax fee that I will have to eat since this product never worked.
customer_reviews.author: KSF

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and works like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and works like advertised. Now I know where my 17 year old is at all times. At least where my truck is............
customer_reviews.author: Lee F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a must-have for people that have elderly parents.
customer_reviews.text: The product has exceeded expectations in many ways it was easy to install and the tech support as excellent I would highly recommend this to anybody that had teens or elderly parents to reassure their safety and whereabouts.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to set alerts and watch where my ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works as marketed. I love being able to set alerts and watch where my daughter is going and having good driving habits. One improvement in tracking would be a notification as to when the car has been started or is moving. No alerts for that. Easy install on the vehicle with plug in under the front dash by emergency brake.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle DG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great gps app and this is a great item easy installation and very accurate and will definitely tell you where someone is time day all that speed you name it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittmakesyourhairgorgeous

customer_reviews.title: This works great for keeping tabs on young drivers
customer_reviews.text: This works great for keeping tabs on young drivers. You can keep track of where they are and have been as well as how well they are driving. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for checking on safety
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tracker after our teen had 2 speeding tickets and we needed for him to have some better accountability. It did exactly what we wanted - providing real time information and a grade card for his driving each day. Not only could we ensure that he was keeping his speed at a reasonable level, it pointed out some other areas where his driving could improve. While he was restricted to driving to work and school only, we could check to see that he didn't go anywhere else due to the real-time GPS tracking. It has been a very useful tool for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wished i got this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for anyone with a teen driver. The gps locator manages to get a signal hidden under the dash while in the garage. The geofencing capability is wonderful. Easy to know when ypur teen has made it to school or work. The only negative is the app is far less functional than the actual website and the website does not display well on a phone.
customer_reviews.author: robby

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that our family is very happy with! We use it all the time, and it’s a reliable and consistent product. We would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kent

customer_reviews.title: Works great, reliable
customer_reviews.text: I found this easy to install, setup and use. It worked well. I liked the phone app for keeping taps on the location, it worked well. I used this as the main tool to locate the vehicle. My only issue is when the operator discovered it, the operator 'accidentally' removed. That was easy to detect and correct when I talked to the operator. I had no other problems. I would use this product again when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: lildog

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this to track my teenager. The tracking is ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to track my teenager. The tracking is way off. It will tell me my car is 2 cities over as she's pulling in my driveway. My daughter went to babysit this afternoon, and according to the tracker she's about 18 miles the opposite way. Pay 19.99 a month for a service that I'm not getting. Don't get mad at your teenager and accuse them of being somewhere because chances are the GPS is way off. Going to try a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Franci Reed

customer_reviews.title: High monthly fees
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple of years, then they dropped support for older phones and raised the monthly fee. Removed and tossed in the trash. Purchased a replacement from another company that only charges $8.00 a month.
customer_reviews.author: John (Rusty)

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget that adds to the objective conversation about driving ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gadget that adds to the objective conversation about driving safety and subtracts some of the judgement. It's helping us be safer drivers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore-Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressive product.
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick! Tracks the whereabouts and even let's you know when you are speeding, breaking to hard, how many miles you traveled, idling, etc. I do think the miles per hour is off tho on the this app as I have watched my speed and what the speed limit is closely to find that it is sometimes not accurate. I noticed it said the speed limit was 80 on one hwy when it was only 70. I have also caught that it says I'm speeding when I wasn't. So it's definitely not 100% accurate but again, it does the trick. AND, SUPER EASY installation.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Great device!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, and it’s use, just I open the Mobil application and I have the access to see where my son is at.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Soto

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this device to keep track on my teenage daughter. It is the best $20 I ever spent! It allows me to see where she is in real time, how fast she has traveled, it will even tell me if she has applied the brakes rapidly or sat & let her vehicle idle. It notifies me if the device is unplugged & plugged back in as well. I can see/watch her every move through the MOTOsafety app I’ve downloaded on my phone. Highly recommended & would definitely purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After I used it for 3 months it stopped working. I called moto safety and they could not help me. When it did work it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: WARNING THIS DEVICE ALMOST KILLED MY SON AND I
customer_reviews.text: WARNING THIS DEVICE ALMOST KILLED MY SON AND I. It caused my rear breaks which are electronic to suddenly lock up while we were driving. we were almost hit head on by a tractor trailer. there has to be some kind of legal action that can be taken to prevent this product from being sold to the public.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing I love the way i can track each and ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing I love the way i can track each and every vehicle the device is hooked up to
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this product! It is very comforting to be able to pull,up in real time, where our daughter is. Eases the mind when the weather is bad or it's getting late. It allows you to see how much fuel is in the car and how the battery is doing. Makes us parents of a new drivers fell much better.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Smith

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this product. It`s detailed to break down just about everything you would want or need to know about the movement of your vehicle. I have told several of my friends about it and they too are pleased with this product and service! Happy Customer!!
customer_reviews.author: vince barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Complicated process
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact that it’s not an all in one easy device to install. You have to activate the account and device separately and they will charge you even though the device is not activated.
customer_reviews.author: Sal garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product but do set up on computer then phone app will work
customer_reviews.text: This tracker is easy to set up once I realised setting up on computer laptop was the way to do it and I needed cars vin number to set up within a hour after computer set no problem just couldn't do set up on phone app but after computer set up no problem with app location is more accurate than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great device to have when you have a teenage driver
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. I use it to track my teenager's driving as well as to find out his location. Highly, highly, highly, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I love the accuracy of the location ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I love the accuracy of the location tracker and the daily driving report. If you want a simple, easy to install device tis is IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.Barton

customer_reviews.title: Not discrete
customer_reviews.text: This GPS was very easy to install and setting up an account was simple. However, I needed a divice that was hidden and this one stands out blatantly. Customer service was great, tried to help me problem solve, took my return and canceled my account with ease. I appreciate how this company handled this. Disappointing it won't work for me but a still a nice little tracker.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: It actually works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by the bad reviews here. I could not be happier with this device. Really easy to install, and is hidden away (2011 Toyota Sienna). It worked with 30 minutes, and it has never failed subsequently. Really accurate tracking in real time, and total peace of mind. Sure - its $20 a month. Is that a lot? Not for the peace of mind. The harsh braking alert seems to come on much too easily when cruise control is on, but that is the only fault. Otherwise one of the most pleasing products I have bought - it does exactly what it says it will do, right out of the box. How refreshing is that?
customer_reviews.author: Styrafome

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my younger sister’s new car, so that if our mom stole it I could track where she took it. It’s been a great investment and gives me lots of peace of mind. Using it to help coach my sister on learning to drive was an added bonus. It was easy to install and the app is simple to use. I was worried it would be too noticeable, but it blends in with my sister’s car’s dark interior, although if her interior was a lighter gray or tan it might be more easily spotted.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Slight issue, quickly fixed great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 for my family. Install and activation was easy enough. The GPS tracking is NOT in real time. It has a couple of minutes delay. It was showing my truck still on the main highway over a mile away while my son was pulling up in my driveway. One stopped working, submitted a support ticket and it was fixed pretty quickly. And I'm super impressed by the courtesy and professional support I received. I definitely recommend. Its 99% accuracy and alerts about braking and check engine lights are also great features.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Monthly service fee to use don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This is so misleading you have to pay for a monthly service. I have 2 teens and can’t afford that. 30 day return really? So upset I am stuck with 2 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Melton

customer_reviews.title: Caused electrical malfunction! Car wouldn't shut off!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! It was ok for about a month, but then the device caused an electrical malfunction in my daughters car! My daughter called me panicking that her car wouldn't turn off! My husband had to disconnect the battery at 10 pm during a snowstorm. The next day my husband pulled the tracker out of the terminal and the car ran normally. He then put it back on and the car and it wouldn't shut off again. Just use a phone tracker, like LIfe360.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works exactly as intended. We were having trouble with my elderly grandmother so we installed this on her car just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as specified online
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for Chrysler so no, doesn’t work for all after date they specified. Tried to return but took new delivery instead for which I am still waiting for the reimbursement on. It didn’t occur to me right away. So I can’t really argue the charge on the tracker since I didn’t take the time to reach back, but it is junk for my use, my time is worth something and they could verify I am not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jwillz

customer_reviews.title: easy and stealth
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very reliable - easy to monitor. Battery life is NA since I have it OBDII installed in daughter's car. Geofencing works great - also offers speeding, braking, location data of when the vehicle was last used.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very easy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! I just wish it included Audio! The GPs works wonders! Never lost a signal! Refreshed when needed and it doesn't make noises which helps when your trying to be inconspicuous! App is very is to use wish I was able to set up the geofence through the app and not just my laptop but hey I still love it! Will order more when I get a new car!
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Banks

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these for your vehicles!
customer_reviews.text: This item shorted and had every code on my sons car come up possible after a few months of use. I didnt realize it was this device until after I ended up having to take it to the dealership to figure out the problem. They told me this is common with these types of devices and not worth the risk to damage the computer of your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.text: We actually use these for our work trucks and they work perfectly. Super easy to install. Just plug in and it will activate itself. The online portal is very easy to use and we were able to see where our work trucks where at what time and get a grade based off of there driving habits. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: You should buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tracker. It tracks everything I need to know on my son's car while driving. I also really like the option to set geo fences. It is worth the money and is definitely user friendly, easy to read!!! exceptional!! Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: islandgurl

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with my Subaru
customer_reviews.text: It actually is a great product if you have a compatible vehicle. For my 2018 Subaru Imprezza that is not the case. It causes the computer to crash disabling all radio, back-up camera, media, phone, etc. The seller did suggest trying a hard-wired version, but if the plug it type doesn't work and the fix is removing it, having a hard wired one that isn't so easy to remove doesn't seem like a good plan. Giving 2 stars because I like to concept but can't go higher since it didn't work with my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A GPS product that works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. It works fine and is consistent. Our daughter is driving now and we feel better knowing that we can locate her if the car broke down.
customer_reviews.author: Willie 14

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to be able to keep up with my elderly father and it is fantastic. i wish i'd known about this product when my kids were teens. i would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: wearetheshaws

customer_reviews.title: Works just like advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one to put in a vehicle and was so impressed with the way it works I bought a second unit.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: it does the job
customer_reviews.text: the only thing that irks me is the map is not in real time.. it shows the item moving after a minute pauses. in other words it moves once a minute. other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: THE MAILMAN

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind for worried parents of teenage drivers
customer_reviews.text: The tracker is user-friendly; the alerts are on time, and valid. The cost is reasonable. We monitored the teenage daughter for almost 3 weeks, before she detected the tracker. When friends told her where to find it--she disconnected it and tossed it out the window. As a result, the car is up for sale & this is not a bad thing!
customer_reviews.author: GreenTea3

customer_reviews.title: Its accurate and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this to track our teenager. It works exactly how it says it works. We love it and it gives us a piece of mind. The app will send alerts or texts to your phone. You can even reverse the curfew and you can get messages when the car starts up (notified us that our daughter left school early). It's really great.
customer_reviews.author: Velva McKinsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Does everything advertised, easy to use and download app. Would recommend. Shipped fast. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: 3tigerz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this and will be buying another when my youngest starts driving. I always know where my son is, that hes safe, and whether or not he is driving safely. I've had absolutely no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Dottavio

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last a month.
customer_reviews.text: Stops working less than a month. 2nd device from two different manufacturers that stopped working in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I tracked my teen daughter and it shows where she been if she was speeding and more. I caught her not going to work like she said and hanging out somewhere that she had no business hanging out at. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Renée

customer_reviews.title: Description and specs are not 100% correct
customer_reviews.text: Will not work on all Vehicles from 1996 & up ,as stated in description. We have tried on several vehicles from a 2004 -2016 It worked on 2 out of 5 vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Great device for teens
customer_reviews.text: It works as promised. I get texts if my teen son speeds, idles for too long, drives during the middle of the night, or accelerates or brakes too quickly. My son hates it and calls it his babysitter, but we use it as an educational tool rather than a means of punishing by "we caught you." I wouldn't get it for insurance purposes because the accelerate / braking sensitivity is high (I've been riding with him when it says braking too hard, and I didn't think he was). Otherwise, it's an amazing device.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So far very impressed. Easy installation, seems easy to navigate. Waiting a couple days to see how it tracks when my daughter starts driving her car.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan mount

customer_reviews.title: Don't do anything stupid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to track my wife. The day of delivery I rushed home to see my wife fornicating with another man with my 3 year old son right beside them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mother has early Alzheimer and wanders. This helps ...
customer_reviews.text: My mother has early Alzheimer and wanders. This helps me find her earlier before she drives hours away. I put her allowed driving time 1am to 2 am when she is home: this I get a daily report.
customer_reviews.author: roxannecarg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little device to keep track of the vehicle. I used the app on apple and android and they work fine. There are more features on the website but the apps were fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: FLRoadman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to any parent with a teen driver
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend to any parent with a new or preexisting teen driver. Downside is the monthly cost; but upside; is that I no longer have to guess where my son is located.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Yes, monthly cost.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four of these for each of my fleet. They work well. Yes, there is a monthly subscription cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This product will make you feel at ease and stress-free
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy that I bought this product for my first time driver. it has eased by stress and helped me realize what a wonderful driver my daughter is. I would truly recommend this for any first time driver. I looked at some of the reviews and they had comments like it gave the wrong location, customer service was terrible so on and so on. I have not had that problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanett

customer_reviews.title: A little bit too big
customer_reviews.text: It actually works well. We bought this to make sure our daughter was where she should be and safe. The only problem is that the place that it had to be installed was a little too small. This means that the cover that was put back on bows out a bit. She hasn't noticed it yet but to me it's annoying. Otherwise, easy to set up and works.
customer_reviews.author: QV

customer_reviews.title: MotoSafety tracking device.
customer_reviews.text: This tracking device works great. I wish it had live tracking and not just after the fact travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Smith

product_meta.title: MotoSafety GPS Tracker for Vehicles Car Tracker OBD, Vehicle Tracking Device and  Monitoring System with Real-Time Reports, 4G with Phone App, One Month of Service Included (MPAAS1P1)
product_meta.description: MOTOsafety is a real time, 4G GPS tracker that helps improve teen driving. Monitor your teen's vehicle location & driving behavior in real timewith 100% accuracy using Google Maps. Developed with the input of driving instructors and law-enforcement, MOTOsafety gives parents peace of mind while coaching their teen driver to be safer. Installation:MOTOsafety's OBD GPS tracker simply plugs under the dashboard into the OBD II port of any car or truck manufactured after 1996. With real time vehicle tracking, parents can monitor vehicle location, speed, & direction on Google Maps and receive email/text message alerts based on teen driving habits. GPS tracking service ($22.99/month with no contracts); includes manufacturer's limited lifetime device warranty on GPS tracker.
feature_bullets: Usa, Canada, & Mexico compatible — our GPS vehicle tracker currently works in the United States, Canada and Mexico regions.

Reasonable monthly cost — $22.99/month for cellular network that transports your data wirelessly, no Activation or cancelation fees. Gps tracker operates off a cellular network and reports every 60 seconds.
Reasonable monthly cost — $22.99/month for cellular network that transports your data wirelessly, no Activation or cancelation fees. Activate within 30 days and receive one month of service!
Immediate alerts — Know where your children or family members are at all times with immediate alerts sent Straight to your mobile Device or computer.
Easy Installation — install Moto safety in a vehicle’s obd port and track your teen driver or loved one within seconds.
Geofences — quickly identify important locations, such as work, school, or home, by setting up geofences and getting notifications when those zones are entered or exited.
Accurate reports — monitor your teen’s driving activity, including speed, direction, and location, using Google maps Features.
Driving score — get comprehensive driving report cards that Score driving habits, including harsh braking, speeding, and rapid acceleration.
North America: United States, Canada, and Mexico

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars343 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: MOTOsafety GPS Tracking Device with Free Month of Service, Quick Start Guide, and Smartphone App.
